title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Product Listing:

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit - the ultimate power tool set for all your drilling and driving needs. This kit includes 2 batteries and a charger, so you'll always have power on hand to get the job done. The yellow and black color scheme gives this kit a sleek and professional look.

The drill in this combo kit, model DCD771, is designed to be compact and lightweight, making it easy to handle and maneuver. It features a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for quick and easy bit changes. With a speed transmission that ranges from 0 to 1500 RPM, you'll have the power you need for any drilling task. The drill also boasts a power output of 300 UWO, ensuring that it can handle even the toughest materials. The ergonomic handle provides comfort and control, allowing you to work for extended periods without fatigue.

The impact driver, model DCF885, is also compact and lightweight, measuring only 5.55 inches from front to back. Weighing just 2.8 lbs, it's easy to carry and maneuver in tight spaces. The 1/4-inch hex chuck allows for easy one-handed bit loading, and it accepts 1-inch bit tips for versatile use. The impact driver also features a LED light ring with 3 LEDs, providing superior visibility in dark or shadowed areas. With a delay time of 20 seconds, the light will stay on long enough to complete your task.

This combo kit includes 2 20V Lithium Ion batteries, ensuring that you'll always have a backup ready to go. The charger is also included, so you can quickly recharge your batteries and get back to work. Additionally, this kit features a LED foot light for even more visibility while you work.

With its wide range of applications, the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is perfect for both professional contractors and DIY enthusiasts. Whether you're drilling into wood, metal, or concrete, or driving screws and bolts, this combo kit has you covered. The package contents include 1 DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, 1 DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and 1 Charger.

Upgrade your power tool collection with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. Order yours today and experience the power and performance that DEWALT is known for.

Product Listing:

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit, a powerful and versatile power tool set that will revolutionize your projects. This kit includes the DEWALT DCD771 20V Max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver and the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, along with two 20V Lithium Ion Batteries and a Charger. 

The DCD771 Drill/Driver features a compact and lightweight design, making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces. With a speed transmission that offers both low and high RPM settings (0 to 1500), you can tackle a wide range of applications with ease. The power output of 300 UWO ensures that no task is too challenging, and the ergonomic handle provides comfort and control during extended use. The chuck is a single sleeve ratcheting type, with a size of 1/2-inch, allowing for quick and easy bit changes.

The DCF885 Impact Driver is also compact and lightweight, measuring only 5.55 inches front to back. Weighing just 2.8 lbs, this impact driver won't strain your arm during use. The 1/4-inch hex chuck is designed for one-handed loading and accepts 1-inch bit tips, making it incredibly convenient. The LED light ring with 3 LEDs provides superior visibility, even in dark or shadowy areas, with a delay time of 20 seconds.

With two batteries included in this kit, you'll have plenty of power to get the job done. The charger is also included, ensuring that you can quickly recharge your batteries when needed. The color of the kit is Yellow/Black, giving it a sleek and professional look.

But that's not all - the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit also features an LED foot light for superior visibility. Whether you're working in a dimly lit area or need to see the details of your project, this feature will come in handy.

This power tool combo kit is perfect for a wide range of applications, from DIY projects to professional construction work. The package contents include the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, two 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and a Charger. 

Upgrade your toolbox with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and experience the power, performance, and convenience that only DEWALT can provide.

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit, the perfect power tool set for all your drilling and driving needs. This kit includes 2 batteries and a charger, ensuring you have everything you need to get the job done.

**Product Details:**

1. DEWALT DCD771 Drill/Driver:
   - Speed Transmission: Low: 0 RPM, High: 1500 RPM
   - Power Output: 300 UWO
   - Design: Compact and lightweight
   - Chuck Size: 1/2-inch, Single sleeve ratcheting

   - Accepts 1-inch bit tips
   - LED Light Ring: 3 LEDs with a 20-second delay for superior visibility

- DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver

**Additional Features:**
- LED Foot Light: Provides superior visibility in any workspace

**Specifications:**
- Batteries Included: 2
- Charger Included: Yes
- Color: Yellow/Black
